verses.roman:
'nāra'-śabde kahe sarva jīvera nicaya
'ayana'-śabdete kahe tāhāra āśraya

synonyms: nāra-śabde—by the word nāra; kahe—one means; sarva jīvera—of all living entities; nicaya—the assemblage; ayana-śabdete—by the word ayana; kahe—one means; tāhāra—of them; āśraya—the refuge.
translation: "The word nāra refers to the aggregate of all the living beings, and the word ayana refers to the refuge of them all.
